text:
Going through the documentation issues in Bugzilla I found this: <https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=17827>
The bug requests for the iris documentation to remove the citation to the Annals of Eugenics. It's got one answer saying that maybe it's better to add an explanation about the problematic provenance of the data instead. I think this issue might benefit from a discussion in the broader community. Do you folks agree?
